26
27#ifndef HB_OT_SHAPE_NORMALIZE_HH
28#define HB_OT_SHAPE_NORMALIZE_HH
29
30#include "hb.hh"
31
32
33/* buffer var allocations, used during the normalization process */
34#define glyph_index() var1.u32
35
36struct hb_ot_shape_plan_t;
37
38enum hb_ot_shape_normalization_mode_t {
39 HB_OT_SHAPE_NORMALIZATION_MODE_NONE,
40 HB_OT_SHAPE_NORMALIZATION_MODE_DECOMPOSED,
41 HB_OT_SHAPE_NORMALIZATION_MODE_COMPOSED_DIACRITICS, /* Never composes base-to-base */
42 HB_OT_SHAPE_NORMALIZATION_MODE_COMPOSED_DIACRITICS_NO_SHORT_CIRCUIT, /* Always fully decomposes and then recompose back */
43
44 HB_OT_SHAPE_NORMALIZATION_MODE_AUTO, /* See hb-ot-shape-normalize.cc for logic. */
45 HB_OT_SHAPE_NORMALIZATION_MODE_DEFAULT = HB_OT_SHAPE_NORMALIZATION_MODE_AUTO
46};
47
48HB_INTERNAL void _hb_ot_shape_normalize (const hb_ot_shape_plan_t *shaper,
49 hb_buffer_t *buffer,
50 hb_font_t *font);
51
52
53struct hb_ot_shape_normalize_context_t
54{
55 const hb_ot_shape_plan_t *plan;
56 hb_buffer_t *buffer;
57 hb_font_t *font;
58 hb_unicode_funcs_t *unicode;
59 const hb_codepoint_t not_found;
60 bool (*decompose) (const hb_ot_shape_normalize_context_t *c,
61 hb_codepoint_t ab,
62 hb_codepoint_t *a,
63 hb_codepoint_t *b);
64 bool (*compose) (const hb_ot_shape_normalize_context_t *c,
65 hb_codepoint_t a,
66 hb_codepoint_t b,
67 hb_codepoint_t *ab);
68};
69
70
71#endif /* HB_OT_SHAPE_NORMALIZE_HH */
72
